requirements.summary: Replace all inflated or fabricated statistics with honest, aspirational, mission-driven copy throughout the homepage, hero section, stats bar, and footer
acceptanceCriteria: No fabricated numeric statistics (patient counts, satisfaction percentages, etc.) appear anywhere on the site
Hero and stats sections contain aspirational, forward-looking mission statements instead
All copy reads as authentic and honest without inflated claims
Aspirational language is consistent in tone across homepage, hero, stats bar, departments section, and footer

file_operations.description: Replace all numeric statistics and fabricated claims with honest, aspirational mission statements. Update the stats section to feature forward-looking language such as 'Our mission is to be trusted by every patient, everywhere', 'Committed to delivering pure and proper healthcare to the world', 'Aspiring to set the global standard in patient care'. Remove any unverifiable patient count claims or satisfaction percentages. Ensure all department descriptions use authentic, vision-driven copy.

Update hero section, stats display, and feature descriptions to remove any fabricated statistics. Replace with aspirational messaging aligned with the hospital's mission: pure healthcare, proper facilities, and global aspiration. Ensure the three-step 'how it works' section reflects honest, achievable language.

Replace any boilerplate or inflated claims in the footer with the hospital's core values and mission statement. Add a concise tagline such as 'Built on the promise of world-class health facilities for all' or 'Giving pure and proper health facilities'. Remove any fabricated statistics or unverifiable claims from the footer content.

requirements.summary: Perform comprehensive UI polish pass across all pages and components with refined spacing, typography, visual hierarchy, premium styling, animations, cohesive color usage, and responsive layout
acceptanceCriteria: Spacing and padding are consistent and intentional across all sections
Typography hierarchy is clear: H1 > H2 > H3 > body with appropriate scale and weight
Cards, sections, and interactive elements have premium styling with depth and polish
Hover and scroll animations are smooth and purposeful without being distracting
Color palette is cohesive using the teal/emerald/cyan theme throughout
Layout is fully responsive and looks premium on mobile, tablet, and desktop

file_operations.description: Apply comprehensive UI polish: tighten spacing and padding with consistent vertical rhythm, refine typography hierarchy (stronger heading scales, improved line-height and letter-spacing), elevate visual hierarchy so hero and key sections command attention, add premium card styling with subtle depth (shadows, borders), implement smooth scroll and hover animations, ensure cohesive teal/emerald/cyan color usage from tailwind.config.js, and optimize responsive breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop. Enhance the services grid, stats section, and doctors listing with premium visual treatment.

Apply comprehensive UI polish: refine spacing and padding for consistent vertical rhythm, strengthen typography hierarchy across hero headline, subheadline, and feature cards, add premium card styling with depth effects (shadows, subtle borders or glassmorphism), implement smooth hover and scroll animations on feature cards and CTA buttons, ensure cohesive color palette usage, and optimize responsive layout for all screen sizes. Polish the three-step section with refined spacing and visual treatment.

Apply UI polish: refine spacing and padding for the emergency hotline bar and main navigation, strengthen typography for navigation links, improve visual hierarchy, ensure cohesive teal/emerald/cyan color usage, add smooth hover transitions on navigation items, and optimize responsive behavior for mobile menu. Ensure the header maintains premium visual quality across all breakpoints.

Apply UI polish: refine layout with tighter, intentional spacing, improve typography hierarchy for footer sections and links, add proper visual separation between sections (subtle borders or spacing), ensure cohesive color usage from the teal/emerald/cyan palette, and optimize responsive layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop. Ensure the CTA banner has premium styling with depth and polish.

Apply UI polish: refine card spacing and padding, strengthen typography hierarchy for role titles and descriptions, add premium card styling with subtle depth (shadows, borders, hover effects), implement smooth hover and selection animations, ensure cohesive teal/emerald/cyan color usage, and optimize responsive grid layout for all screen sizes.

Enhance global styles to support premium UI: refine base typography settings (line-height, letter-spacing, font weights), ensure smooth animation utilities (fade-in, slide-up, pulse) are optimized and purposeful, verify theme color variables are cohesive with the teal/emerald/cyan palette, and add any additional utility classes needed for consistent spacing and visual rhythm across the application.

requirements.summary: Redesign the hero section of the HomePage to be visually striking and aspirational with bold layout, strong headline, compelling subheadline with honest mission-driven copy, prominent CTA, and high-quality visual element
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width with a premium visual design
Headline clearly communicates the hospital's aspirational, world-class mission
No false statistics or unverified claims appear in the hero
Call-to-action button is prominent and visually appealing
Hero looks outstanding on all screen sizes

file_operations.description: Redesign the hero section to be visually striking and aspirational. Create a full-width layout featuring a bold headline communicating the world-class mission (e.g., 'Aspiring to set the global standard in patient care'), a compelling subheadline with honest mission-driven copy (e.g., 'Giving pure and proper health facilities'), and a prominent call-to-action button. Integrate the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as a background with soft teal and emerald gradient blending. Ensure no fabricated statistics appear in the hero. Add subtle animations and ensure outstanding responsive design across mobile, tablet, and desktop. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Enhance the existing hero section to align with the aspirational redesign. Strengthen the headline to clearly communicate the hospital's world-class mission, refine the subheadline with honest, forward-looking copy, and make the CTA button more prominent with premium styling. Consider integrating frontend/public/assets/generated/global-reach.dim_800x800.png as a supporting visual element (e.g., as an illustration alongside the hero text). Ensure no fabricated claims appear and the hero is fully responsive. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Enhance the Footer component with refined layout, consistent branding, honest mission-driven messaging, mission statement tagline, premium spacing, proper visual separation, and full responsiveness
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains a concise, honest mission statement or tagline
No inflated statistics or false claims appear in the footer
Footer layout is clean, well-spaced, and visually consistent with the rest of the site
Footer is fully responsive across all breakpoints

file_operations.description: Enhance the Footer with a concise mission statement tagline such as 'Built on the promise of world-class health facilities for all' or 'Giving pure and proper health facilities'. Replace any boilerplate or inflated claims with the hospital's core values: pure healthcare, proper facilities, and global aspiration. Refine the layout with premium spacing, proper visual separation between sections (subtle borders or dividers), consistent branding using the teal/emerald/cyan palette, and ensure full responsiveness across mobile, tablet, and desktop. Remove any fabricated statistics or unverifiable claims.
